response.overview: 200 Million follows Jacob “JJ” Jesuobo, a struggling Edo-born returnee from the U.K. whose past in internet fraud leaves him broke and desperate. Alongside his friend Udo, he scrapes by on small, comical scams—until he overhears a plot involving $200 million hidden within his church. JJ seizes the opportunity, dragging Udo and clueless Saheed into an amateur heist that spirals into a chaotic quest  for a better life. Blending humor and social insight, the film highlights the struggles and ambitions of young Nigerians fighting for survival.
response.title: 200 million
